overview:
Jennifer is a Marketing professional with a proven track record for success by driving aggressive, cross-platform campaigns.

She is currently a Marketing Manager at NationalNet in Marietta, GA. She holds two Bachelorâ€™s Degrees from the University of Georgia in Advertising and English. She is pursuing her Executive MBA at the University of Georgia’s Terry College of Business and will graduate in 2013.

She has developed successful marketing strategies that include social media, SEM, SEO, traditional advertising and PR for NationalNet, McCormick International USA and DS Waters of America (Alhambra, Crystal Springs, and Sparkletts).

Jennifer continues her philanthropy work with the Atlanta Health Initiative as a Board Member and Marketing Chair, and she serves on the TechBridgeâ€™s Digital Ball Raffle Committee.
